name: Hey Bujjji!!
greetingText: I love you so fucking much!!!
wishText:
Happy valentine's day my love.I am in love with you. Nothing is ever going to change that. You are the most important thing in my life. I love everything about you. I always want to be by your side, and it's difficult to live without you. I love you more than I ever dreamed possible. Always stay happy and be confident because you have me to face to achieve anything. We will together make our life even more beautiful.
I love you bujjjii
